1459600.name: Cross of Auria - Challenge of the Headless
1459600.description:
Challenge the Headless Horseman from the Cross of Auria Halloween 2020 event whenever you want with this Challenge of the Headless pass!

This DLC Includes
• Permanent access in the Veil to the Headless Horseman challenge.
• Level 20, 50, 75, 100, and 120 variants of the Horseman which replace the fixed level 20 F2P version of the event.

Horseman Special Drop Rates
Level 20
"Guide: Arcane Shock II" - 1%
Hallows Accessories - Scarf, Earrings, Scabbard, Strap - 1% Each

Level 50
"Guide: Arcane Shock II" - 2%
Hallows Accessories - Scarf, Earrings, Scabbard, Strap - 1% Each
Hallows Weapons - Sword+, Great Axe+, Dagger+, Wand+ - 1% Each

Level 75
"Guide: Arcane Shock II" - 3%
Hallows Accessories - Scarf, Earrings, Scabbard, Strap - 2% Each
Hallows Weapons - Sword+, Great Axe+, Dagger+, Wand+ - 2% Each

Level 100
"Guide: Arcane Shock II" - 3%
Hallows Accessories - Scarf, Earrings, Scabbard, Strap - 2% Each
Hallows Weapons - Sword+, Great Axe+, Dagger+, Wand+ - 2% Each
Schematics: Hallows Weapons ++ - 1% Each

Level 120
"Guide: Arcane Shock II" - 4%
Hallows Accessories - Scarf, Earrings, Scabbard, Strap - 3% Each
Hallows Weapons - Sword+, Great Axe+, Dagger+, Wand+ - 3% Each
Schematics: Hallows Weapons ++ - 3% Each

Minimum in-game requirements:
• Ruby must be able to access the Veil at will from anywhere in the world.
